is chalky white. A blood test 
will show whether your baby 
has ‘breastmilk’ jaundice, 
which will go away by itself, 
or jaundice that may need 
urgent treatment. If jaundice 
develops	in	the	first	24	hours	
after birth urgent medical 
treatment is required.
Babies with additional 
needs
If your baby has additional 
needs, you will be coping 
with	a	lot	of	different	
feelings. You will also need 
to cope with the feelings 
of	others	–	your	partner,	
relations	and	friends	–	as
